objects.name: IP Address for known C2 channel
objects.pattern: [network-traffic:extensions.'http-request-ext'.request_method = 'get' AND network-traffic:dst_ref.value = '198.51.100.53' AND network-traffic:dst_port = 25 AND network-traffic:extensions.'http-request-ext'.request_header.'Accept-Encoding' = 'gzip,deflate' AND network-traffic:extensions.'http-request-ext'.request_header.Host = 'www.example.com' AND network-traffic:extensions.'http-request-ext'.request_header.From = 'bob@example.com']
